len.name: Len
len.description: What is a VTuber doing in this game?

MusicNote.name: Music Note
MusicNote.description: At start of turn, <c=action>eat</c> <=boldPink>{0}</c> <c=status>bananas</c> for free. <c=downside>Normal bananas are disabled</c>.

Banana.name: Banana
Banana.description: Amount of bananas Len has stored.

EatBanana.name: Eat Banana
EatBanana.description: Len <c=action>eats</c> a <c=status>banana</c>, making the enemy so hungry they lose {{Damage}} hull.{{MaidDress}}

SmashBanana.name: Smash Banana
SmashBanana.description: Get rid of {{Amount}} <c=status>bananas</c>. Doesn't trigger Banana Stash.

ThrowBanana.name: Throw Banana
ThrowBanana.description: Len <c=action>throws</c> a <c=status>banana</c> so fast and strongly it deals {{Damage}} piercing damage to the enemy.{{MaidDress}}

BananaStash.name: Banana Stash
BananaStash.description:
Each turn, Len <c=action>eats</c> a <c=status>banana</c>.
<c=hurt>If there are no bananas, there will be no effect</c>.

Brioche.name: Brioche
Brioche.description: On pickup, <c=status>Banana</c> damage is increased by 1.

MaidDress.name: Maid Dress
MaidDress.description: <c=healing>#Blessed.</c> <c=status>Bananas</c> now give you 2 <c=status>SHIELD</c> before <c=action>eating</c> or <c=action>throwing</c> them.

TwinPower.name: Twin Power
TwinPower.description:
<c=405a7f>Rin is hiding in the other ship.</c>
Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>On even turns, enemy ship gains 2</c> <c=status>overdrive</c>.

Paradichlorobenzene.name: Paradichlorobenzene
Paradichlorobenzene.description: If you have <c=status>bananas</c>, the enemy loses all <c=status>shield</c>. <c=healing>Gain</c> a <c=status>banana</c>.

ToluthinAntenna.name: Toluthin Antenna
ToluthinAntenna.description: Add 1 of {{Amount}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=hacker>Max</c> & <c=peri>Peri</c> cards to your hand.
